attributes.additional_details: As a remain voter I remain perplexed by the actions and behaviour of politicians in Parliament in response to the EU referendum. I am deeply concerned that the failure to negotiate an acceptable position in 3 has resulted in a failure to tackle issues of national urgency. We need an urgent remedy that honours the outcome of the national vote and ensures we can focus on issues that impact on people’s daily lives such as social care, education, employment, etc
attributes.background: I believe all political parties are duty bound to provide an absolute position on their  position with regards to EU membership and set out their domestic priorities and funding commitments.
